postural weight coefficient. It is a scalar multiplying the postural weight gradient. Especially important when using last_stack_type 1 and 3

qpOases Maximum Number of Working Set recalculations for the first task. If too low, the QP can fail to converge.

paramsTuner allows to change the controller parameters online. You can mouse over the labels to have a description of every parameter. Scalar parameters of type double, int and bool are currently supported. Please use the scrollbar on the right instead of the scrolling wheel on your mouse to avoid changing the slides by chance.
